alert.note: Alert for Northeast Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 16 at 8:36PM AKST until January 17 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 9 PM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 35 to 55 mph with gusts of 75 to 90 mph expected. * WHERE...Valdez and Thompson Pass. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 9 PM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property, and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will rapidly strengthen overnight tonight. The strongest winds are expected during the day Wednesday. Winds will slowly diminish Wednesday night through Thursday. Strong winds may produce areas of blowing and drifting snow along area roadways. Blowing snow may reduce visibility at times.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind. Prepare for the possibility of widespread power outages. Use caution if you must drive.
